info.title: The Events Calendar REST API
info.description: The Events Calendar REST API allows accessing upcoming events information easily and conveniently.

width.description: The image width in pixels in the specified size

height.description: The image height in pixels in the specified size

url.description: The link to the image in the specified size on the site

currency_position.description: The position of the currency symbol in the cost string

values.description: A sorted array of all the numeric values for the cost

taxonomy.description: The taxonomy the term belongs to

parent.description: The term parent term if any

count.description: The number of posts associated with the term

url.description: The URL to the term archive page

urls.description: A list of links to the term own, archive and parent REST URL

url.description: The URL to the full size version of the image

width.description: The image natural width in pixels

height.description: The image natural height in pixels

sizes.description: The details about each size available for the image

global_id.description: The event ID used to globally identify in Event Aggregator

global_id_lineage.description: An Array containing the lineage of where this event comes from, this should not change after the event is created.

author.description: The event author WordPress post ID

date.description: The event creation date in the site time zone

date_utc.description: The event creation date in UTC time

modified.description: The event last modification date in the site time zone

modified_utc.description: The event last modification date in UTC time

url.description: The URL to the event page

rest_url.description: The TEC REST API link to fetch this event

all_day.description: Whether or not this event is an all day Event

start_date.description: The event start date in the event or site time zone

start_date_details.description: An array of each component of the event start date

end_date.description: The event end date in the event or site time zone

end_date_details.description: An array of each component of the event end date

utc_start_date.description: The event start date in UTC time

utc_start_date_details.description: An array of each component of the event start date in UTC time

utc_end_date.description: The event end date in UTC time

utc_end_date_details.description: An array of each component of the event end date in UTC time

timezone_abbr.description: The abbreviated event time zone string

cost.description: The event cost including the currency symbol

show_map.description: Whether the map should be shown for the event or not

show_map_link.description: Whether the map link should be shown for the event or not

hide_from_listings.description: Whether an event should be hidden from the calendar view or not

sticky.description: Whether an event is sticky in the calendar view or not

featured.description: Whether the event is featured in the calendar or not

global_id.description: The venue ID used to globally identify in Event Aggregator

global_id_lineage.description: An Array containing the lineage of where this organizer comes from, this should not change after the organizer is created.

author.description: The venue author WordPress post ID

date.description: The venue creation date in the site time zone

date_utc.description: The venue creation date in UTC time

modified.description: The venue last modification date in the site time zone

modified_utc.description: The venue last modification date in UTC time

url.description: The URL to the venue page

show_map.description: Whether the map should be shown for the venue or not

show_map_link.description: Whether the map link should be shown for the venue or not

global_id.description: The organizer ID used to globally identify in Event Aggregator

global_id_lineage.description: An Array containing the lineage of where this organizer comes from, this should not change after the organizer is created.

author.description: The organizer author WordPress post ID

date.description: The organizer creation date in the site time zone

date_utc.description: The organizer creation date in UTC time

modified.description: The organizer last modification date in the site time zone

modified_utc.description: The organizer last modification date in UTC time

url.description: The URL to the organizer page

200.description: Returns the documentation for The Events Calendar REST API in Swagger consumable format.

parameters.description: The archive page to return
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of events to return on each page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Events that start on the specified date
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: Events that end on the specified date
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Events that start before the specified date
parameters.name: starts_before

parameters.description: Events that start after the specified date
parameters.name: starts_after

parameters.description: Events that end before the specified date
parameters.name: ends_before

parameters.description: Events that end after the specified date
parameters.name: ends_after

parameters.description: Dates set using the start_date/end_date, starts_*/ends_* are set to start at the specified times. The default behavior is to include the entire days.
parameters.name: strict_dates

parameters.description: Events should contain the specified string in the title or description
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified categories slugs or IDs
parameters.name: categories

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified tags slugs or IDs
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified venue IDs
parameters.name: venue

parameters.description: Events should be assigned one of the specified organizer IDs
parameters.name: organizer

parameters.description: Events should be filtered by their featured status
parameters.name: featured

parameters.description: The event post status
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by whether their venue has geolocation data
parameters.name: geoloc

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue latitude location, must also provide geoloc_lng
parameters.name: geoloc_lat

parameters.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue longitude location, must also provide geoloc_lat
parameters.name: geoloc_lng

parameters.description: Include events with one of the post IDs specified in the array of CSV list, date filters will be ignored.
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Events should be filtered by their post_parent being the specified one.
parameters.name: post_parent

parameters.description: Filter events with or without tickets.
parameters.name: ticketed

200.description: Returns all the upcoming events matching the search criteria

400.description: One or more of the specified query variables has a bad format

404.description: The requested page was not found.

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a new event. This endpoint requires title, start_date, and end_date. Do NOT use `/events/{id}` for event creationâ€”use that only for updating or deleting an existing event. A successful POST to `/events` creates a new event and returns its data.

date_utc.description: The event publication date (UTC time zone)

all_day.description: Whether the event lasts the whole day or not

start_date.description: The event start date and time

end_date.description: The event end date and time

image.description: The event featured image ID or URL

show_map.description: Whether the event should show a map or not

show_map_link.description: Whether the event should show a map link or not

hide_from_listings.description: Whether events should be hidden in the calendar view or not

sticky.description: Whether the event should be sticky in the calendar view or not

featured.description: Whether the event should be featured on the site or not

categories.description: The event category ID or name

tags.description: The event tag ID or name

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format

403.description: The user is not authorized to create events

parameters.description: the event post ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The event password
parameters.name: password

200.description: Returns the data of the event with the specified post ID

400.description: The event post ID is missing.

403.description: The event with the specified ID is not accessible.

404.description: An event with the specified ID does not exist.

parameters.description: the event post ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The event password
parameters.name: password

200.description: Returns the data of the updated event

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format

403.description: The user is not authorized to update events

parameters.description: the event post ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The event password
parameters.name: password

200.description: Deletes an event and returns its data

400.description: The event post ID is missing or does not exist.

403.description: The current user cannot delete the event with the specified ID.

410.description: The event with the specified ID has been deleted already.

500.description: The event with the specified ID could not be deleted.

parameters.description: the event post name
parameters.name: slug

200.description: Returns the data of the event with the specified post ID

400.description: The event post ID is missing.

403.description: The event with the specified ID is not accessible.

404.description: An event with the specified ID does not exist.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The archive page to return

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of venues to return on each page

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Venues should contain the specified string in the title, description or custom fields

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Venues should be related to this event

parameters.name: has_events
parameters.description: Venues should have events associated to them

parameters.name: only_with_upcoming
parameters.description: Venues should have upcoming events associated to them

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The organizer post status

200.description: Returns all the venues matching the search criteria

400.description: One or more of the specified query variables has a bad format

404.description: The requested page was not found.

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a new venue. Do NOT use `/venues/{id}` for venue creationâ€”use that only for updating or deleting an existing venue. A successful POST to `/venues` creates a new venue and returns its data.

date_utc.description: The venue publication date (UTC time zone)

show_map.description: Whether events linked to the venue should show a map or not

show_map_link.description: Whether events linked to the venue should show a map link or not

image.description: The organizer featured image ID or URL

201.description: Returns the data of the newly created venue

400.description: A required parameter is missing or an input parameter is in the wrong format

403.description: The user is not authorized to create venues

parameters.description: the venue post ID
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the data of the venue with the specified post ID

400.description: The venue post ID is missing.

403.description: The venue with the specified ID is not accessible.

404.description: A venue with the specified post ID does not exist.

parameters.description: The archive page to return
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of event categories to return on each page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Ensure result set exclude specific IDs
parameters.name: exclude

parameters.description: Limit result set to specific IDs
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Sort collection by term attribute
parameters.name: orderby

parameters.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts
parameters.name: hide_empty

parameters.description: Limit result set to terms assigned to a specific parent
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Limit result set to terms assigned to a specific post
parameters.name: post

parameters.description: Limit result set to terms assigned to a specific event (an alias of the "post" parameter)
parameters.name: event

parameters.description: Limit result set to terms with a specific slug
parameters.name: slug

200.description: Returns all the event categories matching the search criteria

400.description: One or more of the specified query variables has a bad format

404.description: The requested page was not found.

parameters.description: the event category term ID
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the data of the event category with the specified term ID

400.description: The event category term ID is missing.

404.description: An event category with the specified term ID does not exist.

parameters.description: the event category term ID
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the data of the updated event category

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: slug

200.description: Returns all the event tags matching the search criteria

400.description: One or more of the specified query variables has a bad format

404.description: No event tags match the query or the requested page was not found.
